definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.chinese: 旅客付了直到拉尼的車費。

sentences.english: And you don't know basically if what you are being charged is necessarily the proper price.
sentences.chinese: 你基本不知道你給多少車費是合適的。

sentences.english: Taxi fares are chargeable by offline credit card via the internet.
sentences.chinese: 的士車費會透過離線方式以信用咭收取。
不限制公里數的行車費是20美元。

sentences.english: These are popular accompaniments to breakfast or brunch fare.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是受歡迎的伴奏，以早餐或午餐車費。

sentences.english: Where can I change some money to pay the taxi?
sentences.chinese: 我到哪裏去換零錢來付計程車車費？

sentences.english: Many stations now offer Fare Charts in English near the ticket vending machines.
sentences.chinese: 現在很多車站會在售票機旁提供車費圖表。

sentences.english: Violators Will Be Citied or Towed Away at Vehicle Owner's Expense.
sentences.chinese: 佔用者將被罰或被拖車並需自負拖車費。

sentences.english: If time permits, save the fee of bus ticket as reward of your walk.
sentences.chinese: 如果有時間，把回家的車費當作步行的犒勞。

sentences.english: A uniform fare of ten dollars for any distance.
sentences.chinese: 不論遠近車費一律拾元。

sentences.english: The bus company decided to raise the bus fare by one yuan.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車公司決定把車費提高壹元。

sentences.english: How frequent do you usually use Octopus Card for paying local travelling expenses?
sentences.chinese: 你大約多久會使用八達通去付車費最少一次？

sentences.english: We got a parking ticket for not putting money in the meter.
sentences.chinese: 因爲沒交停車費我們收到了罰單。

sentences.english: Above price are not include tunnel, bridge and parking fee.
sentences.chinese: 以上收費不包括橋費，隧道費及泊車費。

sentences.english: Bus and taxi fares will be raised next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年公共汽車費和出租車費要漲價。

definition: saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese)/(fig.) to bear responsibility
to quote a price/seller's first offer
